name: Zeconds
description:
***************FULLSCREEN IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED*****************

Zeconds is a squad prepared to save planets. They were the last hope to a battle between the planet Citronz and its rival, Zir. Just before he could dominate everything, the 10 Zeconds arrived to save the planet and its citizens against this great evil. Will they be able to accomplish this mission?

Controls:

MoveWASD and ArrowKeysShootJ or Z

***NOTES***

Known Bugs:

- Score is broken/Not working properly
